JobFullDesc: Organization Summary:If you love the pursuit of excellence and are inspired by the challenges that come through driving innovations that impact how the world lives, works, and plays, then we invite you to learn more about Microsoft Operations - and the value we deliver across Microsoft and to our customers and partners. We offer unique opportunities to work on interesting global projects in an environment that appreciates diversity, focuses on talent development, and recognizes and rewards great work. We make doing business with Microsoft easy. Position Description: At Microsoft’s Americas Operations Center we have a passion for customers, partners, and technology.  The Transact Services Team sits within Microsoft Business Operations (MBO) and is responsible for successful and compliant processing of transactions and fulfilment of customer obligations for our most strategic accounts.  The Group Manager – Core Transact is a mission critical role accountable for business success for month/quarter end close processing in partnership with internal and external stakeholders. This role leads a high-performing team, collaborates with other functional teams, partners, and field resources to deliver best in class, integrated transaction services and support experiences.   You will be joining a fast-paced team that is focused on results, works together to solve problems, and is committed to developing people.  The ideal candidate is comfortable working in a highly matrixed, multinational organization, exhibits outstanding organizational, planning, communication, judgement, and negotiation skills, uses data and analytics to drive performance insights and improvements and has strong customer obsession and compliance focus.ResponsibilitiesResponsibilities:Managing a high-performing team driving customer, field, and partner operational requirements into managed service model.Attract, develop, and retain a diverse and high performing team that consistently produces value for the business.Monitor operational performance and compliance of the commercial business, outsourcing support activities, and change management initiatives ensuring achievement of business objectives.Collaborate with other members of Americas and International Operations to deliver transaction services to customers, partners and internal field sellers promoting an end-to-end view and seamless experience.Create and deliver performance metrics and scorecards representing the state of business.
